creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: round basket standing on four inward pointing feet; slightly square around bottom; round body tapers inward at neck and then flares outward to a wide, flat mouth; vertical weave around bottom, horizontal closed weave around upper portion; slats woven together in open weave around mouth; tall, squared handle made of two slats tethered with decorative knots; bamboo cylinder insert
title: Basket
